scripts.dev: concurrently --names server,client --prefix-colors blue,green "pnpm --filter server dev" "pnpm --filter client dev"
scripts.build: pnpm --filter server build && pnpm --filter client build
scripts.typecheck: pnpm --filter server typecheck && pnpm --filter client typecheck
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter server lint && pnpm --filter client lint
